#Combining Source Files
##Sample Criteria
```{r DetailCustomer}
if(!exists("def_full")) def_full<-NULL
debug(input_sample_criteria)
def_full<-input_sample_criteria(def_full,
                                file="Defense_Contract_SP_ContractSampleCriteriaDetailsCustomer.csv",
                      drop_incomplete=FALSE)
  

save(file="Data\\def_all_complete.Rdata",def_full)

```
